Git

Git - Install for Windows

å…¶ä»–å®‰è£…

  • MacOS

    # Homebrew
brew install git

# MacPorts
sudo port install git

# Xcode Command Line Tools
xcode-select --install

# Installing git-gui
brew install git-gui

ssh-keygen -t rsa

  • Linux

    # Debian/Ubuntu
apt-get install git
# å¯¹äº Ubuntuï¼Œè¯¥ PPA æä¾›æœ€æ–°ç¨³å®šçš„ä¸Šæ¸¸ Git ç‰ˆæœ¬
add-apt-repository ppa:git-core/ppa
apt update
apt install git

# Fedora
yum install git # (up to Fedora 21)
dnf install git # (Fedora 22 and later)

# Gentoo
emerge --ask --verbose dev-vcs/git

# Arch Linux
pacman -S git

# openSUSE
zypper install git

# Mageia
urpmi git

# Nix/NixOS
nix-env -i git

# FreeBSD
pkg install git

# Solaris 9/10/11 (OpenCSW)
pkgutil -i git

# Solaris 11 Express, OpenIndiana
pkg install developer/versioning/git

# OpenBSD
pkg_add git

# Alpine
apk add git

# Slitaz
tazpkg get-install git
